get.summary: Get a list of GCC approved records with filters and pagination
get.description: Fetches a list of GCC approved records, with optional filtering based on fields in the gcc_approved_by_admins table, and supports pagination.

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Filter by start date for date

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Filter by end date for date

post.summary: Store a new GCC approved record by admin
post.description: Creates a new GCC approved record with the provided invoice advice ID and additional admin data.

get.description: Fetches details of a specific GCC approved record by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the GCC approved record

delete.summary: Delete a specific GCC approved record
delete.description: Deletes a specific GCC approved record by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the GCC approved record
